p: There was an effect of population on CT max ( F 3,72 = 9.80, P < 0.0001; Fig. 4), with wild-caught zebrafish (measured at site 8 in India, site temperature = 28°C) having a lower CT max than Ancestral (−0.85°C: P < 0.0001), F 1 (−1.01°C, P = 0.0001) and Lab (−0.85°C, P = 0.0001: Fig. 4). Fish weight had no effect on CT max ( F 1,72 = 2.48, P = 0.12). Individual variation in CT max did not differ between the populations (test statistic = 4.50, P = 0.21, CV: Ancestral = 1.34, F 1 generation = 1.23, India = 0.90 and Lab = 0.93).
